subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Delgado went 4 for 5 in his postseason debut, including a towering home run in the fourth inning to bolster a depleted pitching staff and help give the Mets a 1 - 0 series lead.
snippet: Carlos Delgado went 4 for 5 in his postseason debut, including a towering home run in the fourth inning to bolster a depleted pitching staff and help give the Mets a 1 - 0 series lead.
